shortDescription: Elaborate Bytes ElbyCDIO.sys 6.0.2.0 and earlier, as distributed in SlySoft AnyDVD before 6.5.2.6, Virtual CloneDrive 5.4.2.3 and earlier, CloneDVD 2.9.2.0 and earlier, and CloneCD 5.3.1.3 and earlier, uses the METHOD_NEITHER communication method for IOCTLs and does not properly validate a buffer associated with the Irp object, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (system crash) via a crafted IOCTL call.
vulnerabilityName: slysoft anydvd Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
